item.title: Database Schema
item.description:
Database Schema

AI Code Terminal uses SQLite with Prisma ORM for lightweight, efficient data storage. The schema is designed for single-tenant operation with minimal data requirements while maintaining security and performance.

Database Technology Stack

Core Components

  • Database Engine: SQLite 3.x
  • ORM: Prisma 5.x
  • Query Builder: Prisma Client
  • Migrations: Prisma Migrate
  • Schema Definition: Prisma Schema Language

Advantages of SQLite + Prisma

  • Zero Configuration: No database server setup required
  • ACID Compliance: Full transaction support
  • Cross-platform: Works on all operating systems
  • Embedded: No network overhead
  • Type Safety: Prisma generates TypeScript types
  • Migration System: Version-controlled schema changes

Complete Schema Definition

Prisma Schema File

Location: /prisma/schema.prisma

item.title: Data Models
item.description:
Data Models

AI Code Terminal uses a carefully designed data model that supports single-tenant operation, workspace isolation, and real-time session management. This guide covers the business logic, relationships, and usage patterns for each model.

Model Relationships Overview

erDiagram
    Settings ||--|| User : "single-tenant"
    Workspace ||--o{ Session : "has-many"
    Workspace ||--o{ AuthLog : "references"
    Session ||--o{ SystemMetric : "monitors"
    
    Settings {
        string id PK "singleton"
        string githubToken "encrypted"
        string githubRefreshToken "encrypted"
        datetime githubTokenExpiresAt
        string theme
        string preferences "JSON"
    }
    
    Workspace {
        string id PK "cuid"
        string name UK "unique"
        string githubRepo UK "owner/repo"
        string githubUrl
        int githubId
        string localPath
        string branch
        boolean isActive
        datetime lastSyncAt
    }
    
    Session {
        string id PK "cuid"
        string workspaceId FK
        int shellPid
        string socketId
        string shell
        string status
        string workingDirectory
        datetime lastActivityAt
    }
